Favorites¶

class account.views.favorites.FavoritesView(**kwargs)¶

Favorites list of the user by taken token.

@header: user token

Output:

{
    "ids": [
        19,
        21
    ],
    "results": {
        "19": {
            "id": 24,
            "username": "woman4",
            "main_photo": "http://localhost:8085/media/user_photo/24_Ba9PyMS.jpeg.100x100_q95_box-138%2C0%2C962%2C825_crop-smart_upscale.jpg",
            "age": "39",
            "city": "Odessa",
            "country": "CA",
            "language": "en",
            "is_online": true,
            "about_me": "I am  from Odessa"
        }...
    },
    "list": [
        {
            "id": 24,
            "username": "woman4",
            "main_photo": "http://localhost:8085/media/user_photo/24_Ba9PyMS.jpeg.100x100_q95_box-138%2C0%2C962%2C825_crop-smart_upscale.jpg",
            "age": "39",
            "city": "Odessa",
            "country": "CA",
            "language": "en",

        }....

}
